Kadir Ergün

Engineering Manager & PMP

Major Projects

WeFocus SaaS Platform

Scalable employee engagement SaaS developed at Huawei using Java, VueJS, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes, Istio. Improved platform performance by 30% through microservices optimization.

Petal Maps

Navigation app for HarmonyOS, Android, and iOS. Built with Spring Boot, MyBatis, Kafka, Hibernate, Redis. Led cross-platform architecture and development teams.

EBG (e.huawei.com) B2B E-Commerce Platform

Developed custom CMS and multilingual e-commerce system for Huawei’s global business portal using Spring Boot, ElasticSearch, NLP, Restful APIs, Kafka, Kubernetes.

KoçAilem Loyalty App

Loyalty platform for Koç Holding employees and families, serving 200K+ users. Built with C#, Kentico, DevOps pipelines, and SSO integration.

Fenerium E-Commerce

Online retail platform for Fenerbahçe S.K. with payment gateway, recommendation engine, and Kentico CMS.

Avis & Budget Turkey E-Commerce

Developed Avis and Budget e-commerce channels for car rentals. Optimized for mobile performance and seamless booking experience.

Divan Group E-Commerce

Engineered unified e-commerce system for Divan Hotels & retail products using .NET and Kentico CMS.

TurkTraktor Brand Sites

Developed corporate and brand sites for TurkTraktor, New Holland, and Case IH.

Koç Corporate Website

Created unified corporate identity for Koç Holding using modern CMS and modular design system.

E-DNA Mobile App

Android app for Eczacıbaşı, enabling medical education for healthcare professionals with interactive content modules.

CepCard Mobile Payment System

Mobile payment solution enabling wallet integration and secure in-app transactions. Developed both Android client and server-side APIs.
